Idioma.content: IF YOU LIKED PLAYING OUR GAME, FEEL FREE TO GIVE US A DONATION
ARCELIA AND S.O.R.A. WILL THANK YOU AND IT WILL HELP US TO KEEP DOING WHAT WE LOVE.
Brown leather boots that are comfortable.
Ancient artifact that shoots air to destroy rocks with its pressure.
Ancestral arrangement made to robot rangers.
Emblematic decor possesed by any guild member representing the guild's brotherhood
Food that helps miners regain energy.
Greenish gem with which the Everguns were enhanced.
Mechanical gloves that work by steam.
Small watch that is usually carried to the mine in order to not to lose track of time.
Canteen containing a drink that helps you be more active.
Old fashioned mechanism used to cool mining machines.
Legends say that this small pendant is capable of reviving those people who have died with it on.
Armored mirror with the ability to bounce any projectile that hits its surface.
Master miner's weapon Gwein used to blind his enemies by making large holes through which light entered.
Modern evergun used by high-ranking miners. It incorporates an update to extract minerals.
Little known version of the common Evergun that was adapted for the left hand.
Weapon used by miners from the east. Take advantage of a magnetized projectile to make the ammunition return after being fired.
Mechanism that allows a robot to focus part of its energy in a specific area. This needs a cooling time.
Tool used to fill the oil tank to a robot.
Piece of stone where a series of inscriptions in an unknown language are found.
Device capable of storing muscle energy and then releasing it in a single blow.
Remnants of radioactive material that can help robots to be faster.
Common screw. Maybe someone has dropped it?
Small fluorescent cylinder with great energy capacity.
Metal cover that is incorporated into heavy machinery to increase its power.
Book with a purple cover and green leaves that tells the legend of Era.
Small dark mineral that increases the size of the area where the weapon is fired.
Tube filled with lava, whose internal energy increases the strength of the robots. It takes a while to be used again.
Necklace of the same demon, and in it they harbor different curses.
Golden pickaxe of the Great Monteg
This is the most valuable pickaxe and the best treasure that has been found, but no one has seen it in action
Bronze coin in which Nomed is on one side and a tunnel on the other. It is said that it draw in luck.
A machine that brights red and makes a loud beep when a collapse occur.  The miners carry it on their back.
